short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple free Screen Recorder tool. No internet connection needed. Saves videos in mp4 format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and free Screen Recorder extension. Works offline, no internet connection needed. Record what's on your screen and when you're done the recorded video get saved in your downloads folder in mp4 format. Simple!
